original_text: Then the angel of the Lord answered and said, O Lord of hosts, how long wilt thou not have mercy on Jerusalem and on the cities of Judah, against which thou hast had indignation these threescore and ten years?
korean_text: 여호와의 천사가 대답하여 이르되 만군의 여호와여 여호와께서 언제까지 예루살렘과 유다 성읍들을 불쌍히 여기지 아니하시려 하나이까 이를 노하신 지 칠십 년이 되었나이다 하매

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord answered and said
how long wilt thou not have mercy on Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 때까지 예루살렘에 불쌍히 여기지 않으시겠나이까

sentences.original_text: and on the cities of Judah
against which thou hast had indignation
